messages.content:
Can you help me find organizations similar to the Lebanon Social Entrepreneurs organization ( LSE Members – LSE lseassociation.org) that advocates, aggregates and promotes social entprenreneurship in the middle east and north africa? Perhaps in Jordan, Iraq, egypt, Tunisia, Kurdistan, Palestine, Saudi Arabia, or even a regional organization across the whole area. I'm looking for a list of other organizations that are similar and advocate, promote, support and build membership networks of social enterprises. here are some examples, although I'm looking for websites not social media links 1. Jordan Social Enterprise Network (JSEN): JSEN is an organization based in Jordan that advocates for social entrepreneurship. They provide support, training, and networking opportunities for social enterprises in Jordan. Contact information: \[Website\](http://www.jsen.org/) 2. Iraqi Social Entrepreneurs: This organization focuses on promoting and supporting social entrepreneurship in Iraq. They provide resources, mentorship, and networking opportunities to help social entrepreneurs thrive in the country. Contact information: \[Website\](https://www.facebook.com/IraqiSocialEntrepreneurs/) 3. Egypt Network for Integrated Development (ENID): ENID is an organization in Egypt that supports social entrep- reneurship and sustainable development. They provide capacity building, networking, and funding opportunities for social enterprises in Egypt. Contact information: \[Website\](http://enid.org.eg/) 4. Tunisian Social Enterprise Support Organization (TSES): TSES is dedicated to promoting and supporting social entrepreneurship in Tunisia. They offer training, mentoring, and access to funding for social enterprises in the country. Contact information: \[Website\](http://www.tses.org.tn/) 5. Kurdistan Social Entrepreneurs: This organization focuses on supporting social entrepreneurship in the Kurdistan region. They provide training, mentorship, and networking opportunities for social entrepreneurs in Kurdistan. Contact information: \[Website\](https://www.facebook.com/Kurdistan-Social-Entrepreneurs-100286458411516/) 6. Saudi Social Enterprise Network (SSEN): SSEN is an organization in Saudi Arabia that advocates for social entrepreneurship. They offer support, training, and networking opportunities for social enterprises in Saudi Arabia. Contact information: \[Website\](http://ssen.org/) 7. Middle East Social Impact Network (MESIN): MESIN is a regional organization that promotes and supports social entrepreneurship across the Middle East and North Africa. They facilitate cross-border collaboration, provide resources, and advocate for social enterprises in the region. Contact information: \[Website\](http://www.mesin.org/)

can you make a table and summarize them with appropriate headings to help bloom.pm find partners?

messages.content:
Here is a summary table of organizations similar to the Lebanon Social Entrepreneurs organization in the Middle East and North Africa region:

|Organization|Country/Region|Mission|Contact Information|
|-|-|-|-|  
|Jordan Social Enterprise Network (JSEN)|Jordan|Advocates for social entrepreneurship in Jordan. Provides support, training, and networking for social enterprises.|http://www.jsen.org/|
|Iraqi Social Entrepreneurs|Iraq|Promotes and supports social entrepreneurship in Iraq. Provides resources, mentorship, and networking.|https://www.facebook.com/IraqiSocialEntrepreneurs/|
|Egypt Network for Integrated Development (ENID)|Egypt|Supports social entrepreneurship and sustainable development in Egypt. Provides capacity building, networking, and funding.|http://enid.org.eg/|
|Tunisian Social Enterprise Support Organization (TSES)|Tunisia|Promotes and supports social entrepreneurship in Tunisia. Offers training, mentoring, and funding access.|http://www.tses.org.tn/|
|Kurdistan Social Entrepreneurs|Kurdistan|Supports social entrepreneurship in Kurdistan region. Provides training, mentorship, and networking.|https://www.facebook.com/Kurdistan-Social-Entrepreneurs-100286458411516/|
|Saudi Social Enterprise Network (SSEN)|Saudi Arabia|Advocates for social entrepreneurship in Saudi Arabia. Offers support, training, and networking.|http://ssen.org/|
|Middle East Social Impact Network (MESIN)|Middle East and North Africa|Promotes and supports social entrepreneurship in the region. Facilitates collaboration, provides resources, and advocates.|http://www.mesin.org/|
